body_html:
Thanks for the great work!
I installed pytorch on windows using peterjc123's conda package. However, when I try to build an extension using torch.utils.ffi.create_extension I get the follwing error:
fatal error C1083: Cannot open include file: 'TH/TH.h': No such file or directory

Thanks for the great work!
I installed pytorch on windows using peterjc123's conda package. However, when I try to build an extension  using torch.utils.ffi.create_extension I get the follwing error:

body:
Thanks for the great work!
I installed pytorch on windows using peterjc123's conda package. However, when I try to build an extension  `using torch.utils.ffi.create_extension` I get the follwing error:
`fatal error C1083: Cannot open include file: 'TH/TH.h': No such file or directory`
